snippet: “Don’t forget to pay attention to the message, and don’t let the media define what you’re trying to do,” a former Senate leader warned.
abstract: Eight senators in bipartisan group look back to 2006 and 2007--last time major immigration measure was considered--for lessons on broad immigration overhaul; are capitalizing on promising political environment, using more conciliatory language, and trying to harness media to their advantage, among other strategies.
lead_paragraph: “Don’t forget to pay attention to the message, and don’t let the media define what you’re trying to do,” a former Senate leader warned.

headline.seo: Senators Look at ’07 Failure for Lessons on Immigration
headline.main: Senators Look at Past Failures for Lessons on Immigration Overhaul
headline.print_headline: Senators Look to Last Decade’s Failures for Lessons on Immigration Overhaul
